txt.en:
'Ah, you appear to be a capable adventurer. Perhaps you can provide some help.

'I am doing what I can to repair the lift here in Ashâgir. The path up is a treacherous one, and having the lift operational would be a great improvement.

'I could use some more wood for the repairs. You can find trees with suitable branches in the canyon below near the water. I ask that you gather some and return to me.'
Kûzash has asked you to help him gather wood from trees in the area so that he can work to repair the lift.
Bring the wood for the lift repairs back to Kûzash in the Ashâgir hideout.
Gave the wood to Kûzash to assist in repairing the lift
'Welcome back, [placeholder]. I see that you have gathered the wood that I requested.\n\n'You have been a great help to me. Now I must return to work.'
Bring the wood back to Kûzash to help repair the lift
Kûzash has asked you to help him gather wood from trees at the bottom of the cliffs near Ashâgir so that he can work to repair the lift.
